summary: The story of six young volunteers working on a humanitarian project in the woods. Horrific accidents, rash decisions and the unpredictability of human nature leads them all to the same disturbing conclusion. Volunteer work can be a killer.
cast: Indiana Adams|Kurt Cole|Madi Goff|Niko Red Star|Emmy Robbin|Jeremy Vandermause|Marian Bingaman|Travis Scott Newman|Adam Pruitt
keywords: no cell phone signal|splatter comedy|volunteer|black comedy|hit by a car
title: I Didn't Come Here to Die
